content:
# It seems that I have run out of coal in my inventory, which is preventing me from inserting it into the furnace. 
# This is a critical issue since the furnace requires fuel to continue smelting the iron ore.

# I will need to gather more coal before I can proceed with smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# Let's find the nearest coal resource and harvest more coal.

coal_resource_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Finding the nearest coal resource
move_to(coal_resource_position)  # Moving to the coal resource position
harvest_resource(coal_resource_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting additional coal

# After harvesting, I will check the inventory to see the updated resources.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Inspecting the updated inventory after harvesting coal
